Around the end of August 2023, the subject

car parts Tran Manh Tien, address in
Thanh ward.  Xuan District 12, Ho Chi Minh City,
to sell spare parts for many types of motorbikes and

By the day of his arrest, Khang had tricked

Last night on My Phuoc Tan Van street,

A young man was riding a motorbike from

An City Police and the

accurately locate locations in the brain
but also know the steps to take in the
brain surgery procedure. This makes

antarctic fur seals in the
south island are facing a
major survival challenge without enough resources
Essential food information has just been published
in the latest research of the
British Antarctic Survey,
scientists say the number of
Long Mao seals in South Georgia Island is
currently only 3.5 million individuals.
much lower than the previous calculation of 5.5
million in the past 5 years The military population
here has decreased by 40.
Their main food source is the pentapolar mollusk,
a creature that looks like a shrimp when
Hai  If you produce too much, the number of
molluscs may not be able to keep up, so the
two-mouth population will not be able to reproduce well.
One of the main reasons is that
molluscs breed mainly in
areas quite far from their homes and habitats.  breeding grounds for
colored fur seals. Besides, they also have to
compete with other species that also rely on
Antarctic krill as their
main food. For example, since the 20th century, humpback whales
have become Antarctic Long Mao seals.  has become
an endangered species
due to overhunting for its survival.
Thanks to conservation measures, the population
is gradually recovering quickly, but the
lack of food for them could disrupt
this effort.  When the oaks in this area die,
other trees will immediately replace them in
Western France. Forests are
working in this way as an
effective way to combat

The scene of deforestation is quite serious, trees are
